data: {"generalSituation":"A broad trough of low pressure will bring a few showers to southern China tomorrow. Meanwhile, a strong easterly airstream will reach the coast of Guangdong. With the easterly airstream being replaced by a humid southerly airstream, it will be warm during the day with coastal fog in the morning and at night over southern China on Sunday and Monday. A cold front is expected to move across the coast of Guangdong next Tuesday. Winds will strengthen and there will be showers over the region. Temperatures will fall gradually in the middle and latter parts of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260228","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Southeast force 4, becoming east force 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy with a few showers. Coastal fog in the morning and at night. One or two showers at first. Coastal mist in the morning and at night.
